original_title: House Party with Koo Koo Kanga Roo
overview: Does working out make your mouth frown and your muscles melt like cheese? Then you've never tried House Party. This dance-a-long workout is so fun you won't even know you're not at an amusement park drinking a slurpee while you do it. So join Neil and Bryan for a wacky, technicolor dance party right in your living room. Don't forget your sweat band!
title: House Party with Koo Koo Kanga Roo
